Claude Barruck Joseph Lelouch (; born 30 October 1937) is a French movie director, writer, cinematographer, actor and producer. He was born in Paris, France. He is known for his work in the musical epic "Les Uns et les Autres" (1981). He also directed "C'était un rendez-vous". He won two Academy Awards for Best Foreign Movie and for Original Screenplay.
In 1993, he was the President of the Jury at the 18th Moscow International Film Festival.
